title: the login server did not respond and im also unable to send a ticket to riot
body:
i was playing  this morning  got out of the house to do some stuff and when i got back exited to play i cant log in because ¨THE LOGIN SERVER DID NOT RESPOND¨ tried a lot of ¨fixes¨ that i found using google but nothing works and when i try to send a ticket to riot it says that im banned from the webpage ,thank god i had my account logged in already  

it says:
error 1006
acces denied 
What happened?
The owner of this website (auth.riotgames.com) has banned your IP address


what is this all about

replies.body:
This sounds like a *Cloudflare Ban*. These often happen if there's fishy stuff being sent out from your IP address. I suggest grabbing your IP address from [here](http://www.whatsmyip.org/), then submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) from another network and be sure to list that IP address somewhere in your ticket when inquiring about this.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
